Skip to contents
openalexR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    openalex_api

    openalex_api.Rd

    Baseline function for calling the API and parsing results

    Usage

    openalex_api(path)

    Arguments

    path

    the url path to use in the GET request to the openalex API

    Value

    list of parsed JSON returned from the API

    Examples

    openalex_api(path = "https://api.openalex.org/works/W2741809807")
#> $id
#> [1] "https://openalex.org/W2741809807"
#> 
#> $doi
#> [1] "https://doi.org/10.7717/peerj.4375"
